nodes.text: Toast was the name given to toasted bread. Two types of toast were Mustafarian toast and Iktotch toast. The terms "toast" or "toasted" are also used as a slang term for killing a being with a blaster. The name "Garindan" was translated by Wuher's protocol droid to mean "toast" in one alien language that was not Kubaz in origin.
In-universe toast is the same as real world toast.
